title: Everything You Need to Ship Fast
subtitle: Comprehensive toolkit with enterprise-grade features, modern architecture, and developer-first experience

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Built-in multi-layer security protection, including anti-fraud systems, security headers, and API rate limiting.

performance.title: Lightning Fast
performance.description: Based on Next.js 14 and modern architecture, providing millisecond response speeds.

database.title: Type-Safe Database
database.description: Drizzle ORM with TypeScript for reliable, scalable data management.

payments.title: Payment Ready
payments.description: Stripe integration with subscription management, invoicing, and webhooks.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: NextAuth.js with social logins, magic links, and enterprise SSO.

analytics.title: Built-in Analytics
analytics.description: User tracking, conversion funnels, and business intelligence dashboards.

mobile.title: Mobile First
mobile.description: Responsive design with PWA support and native-like experience.

deployment.title: Deploy Anywhere
deployment.description: Support for Vercel, AWS, and traditional hosting platforms.
